questions.questionText: What was special about the Ford Nucleon concept car that Ford developed in 1957?
optionsValues: It was powered by a nuclear reactor
It was the first car with power steering
It was a coorporation with GM

questions.questionText: Nothing stops you from getting creative with what a 'question' really is
